item.description:
This a card flipping fast pace card game.

Aim of the Game is to pick up and align in a row, numbers 1-8 followed by the winner card. You can play the game two ways, easiest is collecting 1-8 of any color you find first, or to make it harder, you must find match all your number cards with the color of the number 1 card you picked up first. You can also remove numbers to make the game shorter in playing time.

How to play the game 
1)Place the Token cards to the sides so it is easily reached by all players. This is where used special cards will be placed.

2)Each player takes one My Turn card to keep until they wish to use it at any point in the game. The rest are put to one side.

3)Decide if you are collecting different colors or the same colors of each number.

4)Place all the cards face down on the table, mix them up, and spread them evenly.

5)Anyone goes first by rolling the dice and starts the game. Pass the dice around to the left until someone rolls the BBD a number 6.

6) The player who gets a 6 then starts to pick up cards to try and find a number 1 card, once found the No.2 then the number 2 card, and so on. You must pick up cards in number order. (so if you don’t have a 1, you cannot pick up a 2).

7) You can only pick up one card at a time and you must place it back on the table face down if not needed or not next in the sequence required.

8) While one player is searching for number cards, the other players take it in turn to roll the dice to try and get a 6.

9) When another player rolls the BBD a 6, it becomes their turn to search for number cards. The previous player searching for cards has to stop searching and join the other players in rolling the dice.

10) Game continues until one person has aligned numbers 1-8 plus the winner card

Special cards 
1) My turn - Use this when you want to jump in the game
2) Steal - Take a card from any other player
3) Bye Bye Dice - If dice is on the table, pick it up and throw it anywhere you want
4) Any Number - This can be used as any number
5) Stop searching - If you pick this up you must stop searching for cards for five seconds
6) 5 Seconds - All rollers of the dice must stop for five seconds

-description from designer

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable
